column1: Kata Robata////Sat there for almost 30 minutes
column2: waiters passed by about 20 times slow with no purpose didn't asked if we needed a server
column3: first time here and never coming back. Sad really
column4: people told me it was really good place but too bad I was starving and couldn't even order food. Only person who acknowledged us was the water guy who came right when we sat down. Left extremely disappointed.
